website_summaries.verdict: An innovative, contoured memory foam pillow with a height-adjustable design. Especially helpful if you need extra neck support for therapeutic use.
pros: Contoured to fit natural curvature of the neck
Promotes correct spine alignment to help reduce aches, pains, and stiffness
Height can be customized by removing center layer
Provides consistent support and doesn't become stiff in cold climates
Breathable, hypoallergenic bamboo/poly cover is cool, comfortable, and easy to clean
Free of harmful chemicals and heavy metals
cons: Might be a bit too soft if you require extra-firm support
